channel.title: How do i add command ("god") and ("godoff")
channel.description: I want to add this command to erasedpkz. So i know i have to go into commands.java and put it in there but when i do i get like 18 errors. So could you help? Thanks.

item.title: How do i add command ("god") and ("godoff")
item.dc:creator: @Michaeliii Michaeliii
item.description:
@Michaeliii wrote:

[quote=“Brandontan, post:7, topic:431885”]replace all that you added for this:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("god") && c.playerRights >= 3) { if (c.playerStandIndex != 1501) { c.startAnimation(1500); c.playerStandIndex = 1501; c.playerTurnIndex = 1851; c.playerWalkIndex = 1851; c.playerTurn180Index = 1851; c.playerTurn90CWIndex = 1501; c.playerTurn90CCWIndex = 1501; c.playerRunIndex = 1851; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.sendMessage("You turn God mode on."); } else { c.playerStandIndex = 0x328; c.playerTurnIndex = 0x337; c.playerWalkIndex = 0x333; c.playerTurn180Index = 0x334; c.playerTurn90CWIndex = 0x335; c.playerTurn90CCWIndex = 0x336; c.playerRunIndex = 0x338; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.sendMessage("Godmode has been diactivated."); } }[/quote]

Thanks. It worked!

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add command ("god") and ("godoff")

item.title: How do i add command ("god") and ("godoff")
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

replace all that you added for this:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("god") && c.playerRights >= 3) { if (c.playerStandIndex != 1501) { c.startAnimation(1500); c.playerStandIndex = 1501; c.playerTurnIndex = 1851; c.playerWalkIndex = 1851; c.playerTurn180Index = 1851; c.playerTurn90CWIndex = 1501; c.playerTurn90CCWIndex = 1501; c.playerRunIndex = 1851; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.sendMessage("You turn God mode on."); } else { c.playerStandIndex = 0x328; c.playerTurnIndex = 0x337; c.playerWalkIndex = 0x333; c.playerTurn180Index = 0x334; c.playerTurn90CWIndex = 0x335; c.playerTurn90CCWIndex = 0x336; c.playerRunIndex = 0x338; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.sendMessage("Godmode has been diactivated."); } }

item.title: How do i add command ("god") and ("godoff")
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“Michaeliii, post:4, topic:431885”][quote author=Chaotic-land link=topic=534592.msg3908418#msg3908418 date=1328460877]
Post your errors.
[/quote]

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:417: error: cannot find symbol
c.setAnimation(1500);
^
symbol: method setAnimation(int)
location: variable c of type Client
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:421: error: cannot find symbol
c.playerSEA = 1851;
^
symbol: variable playerSEA
location: variable c of type Client
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:422: error: cannot find symbol
c.playerEnergy = 99999999;
^
symbol: variable playerEnergy
location: variable c of type Client
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:423: error: cannot find symbol
c.sM(“God mode on”);
^
symbol: method sM(String)
location: variable c of type Client
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:429: error: cannot find symbol
c.sM(“god mode off”);
^
symbol: method sM(String)
location: variable c of type Client
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:430: error: cannot find symbol
c.setAnimation(760);
^
symbol: method setAnimation(int)
location: variable c of type Client
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:434: error: cannot find symbol
c.playerSEA = 0x326;
^
symbol: variable playerSEA
location: variable c of type Client
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:435: error: cannot find symbol
c.playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
^
symbol: variable playerXP
location: class Commands
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
8 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

I don’t know if i suppose to put the c. infront of those lines but every other command in there has it and when i take them out i still get an error but it’s different.[/quote]
remove “.c”
